description: Logan Cross and Tristan Hunter are best friends who tell each other everything, even though Logan's a bit of a prude when it comes to talking about their sex lives! When Logan realizes that Tristan has a crush on Logan's step-dad, the two twinks get to talking and next thing you know Logan is proving how sexually liberated he is by taking Tristan's big cock all the way down his throat. Nothing can stop the two horny and fit dudes from getting it on, not even Logan's step-dad almost catching them in the act! Soon Tristan is bent over and letting his cute friend pound his hole over and over!
title: Don't Tell My Dad: Bareback
